question:
Which among the following pairs is/are correctly matched?
  1. Cocos plate - Between Central America and Pacific plate
  2. Nazca plate - Between South America and Pacific plate
  3. Fuji plate - North-east of Australia
Select the correct code among the options given below:
explanation: Most of the minor plates were formed because of the stress created by converging major plates. There are 7 major plates. And the rest are minor plates.
